summary.para: The ENUMTEXTMETRIC structure contains information about a physical font.

remarks.para: ENUMTEXTMETRIC is an extension of that includes the axis information for a multiple master font.
The , , and functions have been modified to return pointers to the ENUMTEXTMETRIC and structures.

blockquote.para: [!NOTE] The wingdi.h header defines ENUMTEXTMETRIC as an alias which automatically selects the ANSI or Unicode version of this function based on the definition of the UNICODE preprocessor constant. Mixing usage of the encoding-neutral alias with code that not encoding-neutral can lead to mismatches that result in compilation or runtime errors. For more information, see Conventions for Function Prototypes.

summary.para: A structure, containing information about a physical font.
An structure, containing information about the axes for the font. This is only used for multiple master fonts.

summary.para: A structure, containing information about a physical font.
An structure, containing information about the axes for the font. This is only used for multiple master fonts.
